keel.Algorithms.Preprocess.Missing_Values.knnImpute

Class VAList

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Preprocess.Missing_Values.knnImpute.VAList

  • public class VAList
extends java.lang.Object

    This class stores a list of Value-attribute elements. This list contains a FreqList associated to each class, i.e. stores the frequency of each classes associated to a given value.

    Since:
    JDK 1.5

    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Written by Julián Luengo Martín 08/03/2006

    • Method Detail

      • addValueNClass

        public void addValueNClass(double value,
                           double _class)

        Adds an attribute value with its associated class to this list. If no frequency list for this value exists yet, then creates one new.

        Parameters:
        value - The value of the attribute
        _class - The class of the instance from which the value has been extracted

      • getVA

        public valueAssociations getVA(double ref)

        this method returns a object with the frequencies list associated to the value passed as parameter

        Parameters:
        ref - The class of the list we want to retrieve
        Returns:
        The object with the frequencies list of this class

      • getnVA

        public valueAssociations getnVA(int i)

        This method returns the valueAssociations object which is in position 'i'. It is intended for sequential access.

        Parameters:
        i - The index of the VA object we want
        Returns:
        The element VA at position 'i'

      • getNumVA

        public int getNumVA()

        This method gives the number of VA elements stored (i.e. the number of different values)

        Returns:
        The number of elements in the list

      • getNumElems

        public int getNumElems()

        This method returns the total of elements ever added to this list.

        Returns:
        The total number of pairs value-class ever added
